"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Arrival Remaining"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "{%set can_view_rate = frappe.call("edoor.api.utils.can_view_rate") %} {% if frappe.form_dict.get('action')=='view_arrival_remaining' %} {% set data = frappe.db.sql(" select name, reservation, reservation_date, reference_number, reservation_type, business_source, guest, guest_name, business_source, arrival_date, departure_date, reservation_status, room_type_alias, status_color, rooms, room_nights, adr, total_room_rate from `tabReservation Stay` where property= '{0}' and arrival_date = '{1}' and ifnull(keyword,'') like '%{2}%' and business_source = if('{3}'='', business_source,'{3}') and room_types like '%{4}%' and reservation_status in ('Reserved','Confirmed') ".format( doc.name, frappe.form_dict.get('date'), frappe.form_dict.get('keyword') or '', frappe.form_dict.get('business_source') or '', frappe.form_dict.get('room_type') or '' ),as_dict=1) %} {% if (data|length) >0 %} {% if can_view_rate==1%} {%endif%} {%for d in data%} {%if can_view_rate==1 %} {%endif%} {%endfor%}

{%endif%} {%endif%}"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Arrival List"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "{%set can_view_rate = frappe.call("edoor.api.utils.can_view_rate") %} {% if frappe.form_dict.get('action')=='view_arrival' %} {% set data = frappe.db.sql(" select name, reservation, reservation_type, reference_number, reservation_date, business_source, guest, guest_name, business_source, arrival_date, departure_date, reservation_status, room_type_alias, status_color, rooms, room_nights, adr, total_room_rate from `tabReservation Stay` where is_active_reservation = 1 and property= '{0}' and arrival_date = '{1}' and ifnull(keyword,'') like '%{2}%' and business_source = if('{3}'='', business_source,'{3}') and room_types like '%{4}%' and reservation_status = if('{5}' = '', reservation_status, '{5}') ".format( doc.name, frappe.form_dict.get('date'), frappe.form_dict.get('keyword') or '', frappe.form_dict.get('business_source') or '', frappe.form_dict.get('room_type') or '', frappe.form_dict.get('reservation_status') or '', frappe.form_dict.get('floor') or '' ),as_dict=1) %} {% if (data|length) >0 %} {%if can_view_rate==1%} {%endif%} {%for d in data%} {%if can_view_rate ==1 %} {%endif%} {%endfor%}
